body:
Check out FTPSrvSession.java:4381. There you have an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException, since you tried to use the value located at -1 while the valid indexes start from 0.

It smells like you have an array where you try to use length() - 1 and the array is empty, having 0 elements, therefore the result is -1. Try to wrap things into an if, where you check whether the array is not empty. If so, do whatever you have done so far. If not, then in the else you need to handle the case when the array is empty.
